nodes.text: Technopathy was the ability to manipulate technology with the mind. Immortal Rur, a functioning A.I. copy of a long-dead Jedi named Rur, was in fact a powerful technopath. The so-called "phantom passenger" encountered by Graysom, Kanan Jarrus and Hera Syndulla also had such powers, as did the Order of the Sight Voltaic.
